analysis.description:
Reentrancy in GiftCrowdsale.refundPayment (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#654-660):
	External calls:
	- token.burnFrom(msg.sender,token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investments (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol)

GiftCrowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#601-618) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromIco(msg.sender,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#611-612)

GiftCrowdsale.assignTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#638-642) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromIco(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#640-642)

Reentrancy in GiftCrowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#601-618):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFromIco(msg.sender,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#611-612)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investments (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#614-618)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/37/0x6834ffe10a402560cc37033f06321b8a632041c5.sol#612-614)
